== Known Issues ==
== Known Issues ==
â
Popular modding community [[XDA]] has recently discovered a hardware related problem causing volume to decrease without user input. Multiple members have confirmed that radio interference of 900MHz causes the lower volume rocker to malfunction. Although rare within normal use, the issue is most common when switching to 2G connections. This issue has only been confirmed with the GSM version of the Galaxy Nexus, it is unknown at this time if any other version is affected. <ref> XDA-Developers (2011-11-21) [http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1353590&page=32]
+
Popular modding community [[xda-developers|XDA]] has recently discovered a hardware related problem causing volume to decrease without user input. Multiple members have confirmed that radio interference of 900MHz causes the lower volume rocker to malfunction. Although rare within normal use, the issue is most common when switching to 2G connections. This issue has only been confirmed with the GSM version of the Galaxy Nexus, it is unknown at this time if any other version is affected. <ref> XDA-Developers (2011-11-21) [http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1353590&page=32]
</ref>
</ref>
